text: Bürglen can refer to several places in Switzerland: *Bürglen, Obwalden, a settlement in the municipality of Lungern in the canton of Obwalden *Bürglen, Thurgau *Bürglen, Uri, at the entrance of Schächental, start of the Klausen pass road *Bürglen (Albis), a mountain in the canton of Zurich
title: Bürglen
